law.catch_line: If, for a pay period, the pay of an employee placed by an employment agency is not more than the min...
law.text: If, for a pay period, the pay of an employee placed by an employment agency is not more than the minimum wage under § 3-413 of the Labor and Employment Article, the employment agency may not collect or attempt to collect more than 20% of its placement fee from the employee's pay for the pay period.
